welcome_message_body: "Welcome to West Ham, a charming city known for its rich history and lively atmosphere. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this beautiful destination has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to luxury and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: One of the original terminals at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Oneworld airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and Iberia.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport for 45 minutes. After that, you can purchase additional time or use the paid premium service.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The newer and larger terminal at Gatwick Airport, serving a variety of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The older and smaller terminal at Gatwick Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be limited to certain areas or have time restrictions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Luton Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
